name: Playground Unity 2D
description:
A Playground for playing with Unity 2D with some continuous integration (CI) and continuous deployment/delivery (CD).

Source code: https://github.com/beercan1989/playground-unity-2d

To provide CI we test/build the project for each target platform on opening a pull request (PR) for instance into main from a feature branch.

Then to provide the CD part when a PR is merged into the main branch we do the same test and build but then we publish the artefacts into this itch.io project.

The cover image "memanjat" is licensed under CC0 1.0
